name: Table
description: A component for displaying data in a tabular format.

props.name: data
props.description: An array of objects representing the rows of the table.

props.name: columns
props.description: An array of objects defining the columns of the table, each with a 'header' and 'field' property.

props.name: striped
props.description: If true, applies a striped style to the table rows.

props.name: bordered
props.description: If true, applies a border to the table.

props.name: hoverable
props.description: If true, highlights rows on hover.
